item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hour series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar & restaurant scenes in Providence.

This week's location is: India at the end of Blackstone Boulevard on the East Side towards Pawtucket.
This week's host is: Emily! Thanks Emily!

India is an East Side favorite and offers a warm and inviting atmosphere, plus free henna tatoos and belly dancing on the weekends! We'll hopefully be outside in their beautiful back patio.

Hope to see you there!

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.
Ever.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be at the bar wearing the bright blue scarf!
item.name: Monday Night Happy Hour - India!
